short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your productivity by blocking the websites you find distracting.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create rules to block distracting websites by name
Use wildcards like website.com/* to block everything that starts with website.com
Choose between outright blocking access to site, and setting a time buffer between you and said site
Override links and other references to distracting sites using the "remove references from other sites" option
lock-down rules you set for yourself to prevent further editing
